QuestData.Title: Orbs of Power
QuestData.Description: There's a minor fire we'll need to put out before we can enact my plan.$B$BMorkurk has placed powerful wards throughout Gordal Fortress that will prevent any sort of mass summoning - awfully detrimental to our scroll of mass teleportation.$B$BThankfully, no ogre would ever consider that a single enemy or two would have the gall to breach their walls.
QuestData.RewardText: There's nothing Morkurk can do to stop us now.$B$BWell done indeed!
